title: Why almost all mages are either girls or magical creatures?
body:
We have so many champions, but when it comes to choosing a mage from the male roster we have basically an unstable teenager Ekko and an old man Zilean. Thats basically it, everything else is either some sort of spirits or girls. I gues there is also Vlad and Swain but they are terribly outdated and barely even considered  midlaners. Ad midlaners have so many badass human male characters, Yasuo, Zed, Talon, Kayn, Gangplank both lore wise and gameplay wise.
Im a diehard human champion player and it upsets me that out of 130+ champion roster there is not a single mage that I could connect to and want to master/ main.

All in all I think there are many male mages...who are also human (or at least mortal) :P Although new champions are always welcome ^^ If you have an idea, I'm happy to hear it :D

{{champion:112}} ? {{champion:79}} (ok not common in midlane, but still somewhat mageish) ?

Problem with mages versus AD midlaners is weapons used, and thus theme. AD regularly uses their weapons so you can base the character's theme around it (i.e. shuriken > ninja). Mages just use magic which in the end is just color orbs and particle effects, so it is very hard to make a unique human theme for multiple ones. Hence why there is a tendency to make them spirits, only partially humanoid, etc to make the character more interesting and actually explain why they are a mage.
